summary: This mod changes the face and hairstyle only female NPC. Total changes has 326 characters. Potential partners, these changes do not affect.
descriptionHtml:
Version: 1.6
[b]Language[/b]: Russian \ English

[b]Description: [/b]
This mod changes the face and hairstyle only female NPC. Total changes has over three hundred characters. Face dirt has been removed, or replaced with freckles. Women Orcs now do not go as overinflated men (this fix affects Russ orcs).
- When creating a fashion used hairstyles of fashion - SG Hair Pack
- Sam modes completely self-contained and requires no additional installation of plug-ins
- For convenience - all files are packed in a bsa archive
- Companions of this mod does not affect - these plug-ins, and so lacking

[b]Requirements[/b]: Skyrim

[u]It should be completely self-contained and requires no other additions.[/u]

[b]conflicts:[/b]
- This mod will conflict with other mods that alter the same NPC. It is advisable to put the latest fashion in the boot.

[b]installation: [/b]
Steam version:
1 Place the Data folder from the archive into a folder Skyrim
(located at either drive: \ Steam \ steamapps \ common \ skyrim) and confirm the replacement of files (if required).
2 In the game launcher, go to the item "Files" (Data Files) and activate the necessary plug-ins
Before you install - be sure to remove the previous version.

[b]removal: [/b]
Disable the ESP. file in the launcher and delete the previously downloaded files

[b]Acknowledgments: [/b]
Dusha_Volka - otherwise would not have started work on version 1.4
roland1970 - for your help and patience

[b]P.S. [/b]Done to your taste and color.
author: veter75n
